text: Neuzheli obitateli Mekki ne vedayut o tekh blagakh, kotorymi odaril ikh Allakh? Razve oni ne vidyat, chto My sdelali ikh gorod bezopasnym ot grabezha, Zapovednym Svyashchennym mestom, nakhodyashchikhsya v kotorom ne berut v plen i ne ubivayut, v to vremya kak vokrug nikh postoyanno napadayut na lyudey, berut v plen i ubivayut?! Neuzheli oni ne vidyat eti istinnyye blaga i veruyut v neosnovatel'nuyu lozh', no ne veruyut v Mukhammada, v yego poslaniye i v to, chto on im peredayot
